node.description: Barnacle-encrusted pilings flank the exit of this cave, supporting a waterlogged expanse of ship hull used as decoration. Moisture clings to the uneven surface of the cavern walls, trickling down occasionally to gather in small pools on the rough stone floor. A large sign hangs over the counter while a banded oak barrel sits just to the side. On the opposite wall rests a massive iron anchor, weathered and clearly having seen better days.

node.name: Reinventing the Wheel, Entry
node.description: The aromas of hay and wood are very strong in the small entryway. Rough cedar planks, comprising the shop's floor, creak beneath the movements of customers. Two small bales of hay have been used to anchor a large wagon wheel on its end across from the entrance.

node.name: Reinventing the Wheel, West Room
node.description: Two circular display boards, painted to resemble wagon wheels, have been mounted upon the walls. Various images of available merchandise have been placed within the spokes of each display.

node.name: Galleria of Garters
node.description: Elegant gold lanterns glow softly from their perches high above the sales floor. Bolts of vibrant silk drape from the corner posts and airily drift towards the floor. Adjacent to the fabric walls reside pieces of richly polished mahogany furniture which double as displays.

node.name: Ritual Addiction, Ceremony
node.description: Smooth leather walls of overlaid straps with silver studs rise up around a dark haon floor. Dim sconces cast irregular shadows across the room, revealing a collection of haphazardly arranged tables.

node.name: Ritual Addiction, Strife
node.description: Smooth leather walls of overlaid straps with silver studs rise up around a dark haon floor. Dim sconces cast irregular shadows across the room, revealing a collection of haphazardly arranged tables.

node.name: In The Hollow
node.description: A cold draft wafts through the room at regular intervals, its source undetermined. Each passing breeze causes the hooks hanging from the rafters to sway, making the ribbons and papers decorating the pinatas they hold flutter with eerie sounds. A small table set to one side contains additional beribboned items.

node.name: Tastelessly Tacky, Vestibule
node.description: Crystals encrusted on the walls glitter in the warm glow of the candelabra resting on the white harpsichord positioned in the center of the room. Next to the instrument is a mannequin dressed in a dazzlingly white ensemble. A pure white wool rug, its plush pile thick and luxurious, covers the ground.

node.name: Tastelessly Tacky, Containers
node.description: Fake leopard-print wallpaper covers the walls, clashing with the zebra-skin rugs on the black and white checked wooden floor. A counter, covered with red dyed fur, holds containers for sale.

node.name: Tastelessly Tacky, Clothing
node.description: Pink painted walls enclose a wooden floor stained purple. A bright blue table stands in the middle of the room, displaying various clothing items for sale, with an orange and purple painted chest next to it.

node.name: Tastelessly Tacky, Pointy Things
node.description: Plum-colored watered silk covers the upper walls over a wainscotting of cherrywood. Matching planks form the floor which peeks out beneath the numerous sheepskins scattered about as carpets. Wildly painted weapon stands and armor racks display the wares for sale.

node.name: Tieheq with the Thirteen, Vestibule
node.description: Overlapping panels of starlight velvet drape from the ceiling, loosely defining the circular shop. Dominating the center of the chamber is a pure white marble monument of Misiumos.

node.name: Tieheq with the Thirteen, Accouterments
node.description: Overlapping panels of starlight velvet drape from the ceiling, loosely defining the circular shop. Dominating the center of the chamber is a pure white marble monument of Misiumos.

node.name: Tieheq with the Thirteen, Iconography
node.description: Overlapping panels of starlight velvet drape from the ceiling, loosely defining the circular shop. Dominating the center of the chamber is a pure white marble monument of Misiumos.

node.name: Tieheq with the Thirteen, Vestments
node.description: Overlapping panels of starlight velvet drape from the ceiling, loosely defining the circular shop. Dominating the center of the chamber is a pure white marble monument of Misiumos.

node.name: Skin Art by Jaecinda
node.description: The simple wagon lacks any significant decoration. The walls are bare wood, and large windows provide ample natural lighting while an ink-stained rug, likely once cream colored, covers most of the floor. A lone workspace exists for Jaecinda to do her work.

node.name: The Stylish Stallion, Salesroom
node.description: Weathered barn boards have been nailed together to form a paneling that totally covers the walls and ceiling. One side of the room has been painted with a row of horse stalls, complimenting the other images painted around the room to recreate the appearance of a public stable. A layer of straw carpets the floor, releasing its grassy scent into the air when stepped on by shoppers perusing the merchandise displayed for sale.

node.name: Cartilage Crushers
node.description: The dirt-streaked but sturdy canvas walls of the tent are lit by a few dented metal lanterns. Scarred wooden furniture is placed haphazardly around the area and displays a variety of wares for sale. Though the tent appears rundown at first glance, the merchandise is organized precisely and appears to be well cared for.

node.name: Silken Seams, Showroom
node.description: Stained oak panels line the walls, giving the shop a warm feel. Polished brass sconces lend a soft glow to the room overall, while gaethzen lanterns add focused light for the displays. An elegant clavichord with a matching bench stands in the center of the floor, awaiting play by a bard employed for that purpose.

node.name: Hidden Treasures
node.description: Paper-covered figures crowd this small but festive shop, spilling over tabletops and hanging from hooks in the rafters. A small counter provides limited purchasing space, behind which a smiling clerk awaits all customers. Paper frills and ribbons flutter with every passing breeze, causing the room's contents to wave with colorful abandon.

Figures covered in colorful paper sway from their positions on hooks in the rafters, their colors more subdued in the evening light. A few carefully watched lanterns enclosed in thick glass cast light into the dark corners, causing distorted shadow performances on the walls as the light dances over the pinatas on display.

node.name: Misenseor Goods, Entrance
node.description: This small ingress is confined by dark-colored drapery, concealing the rest of the wagon from view. Two openings admit into larger rooms where the wares of the monks are displayed. A sheaf of sirese flowers lies forlornly nearby on the floor.

node.name: Misenseor Goods, Dark Light
node.description: A chandelier with black crystal prisms is mounted on the ceiling, casting the room in an eerie midnight ambience as though beneath a cloud-covered Xibar. Large twin bowls, filled with ash, flank a stylized thirteen-pointed star burnt into the wall between the room's two egresses.

node.name: Misenseor Goods, Shrouding Darkness
node.description: Heavy curtains in a multitude of black and grey hues hang all around the room, only allowing passage through three narrow slits. Several bolts of fabric are propped upright to lean against a wall. A faint scent of incense comes from the middle opening in the curtains.

node.name: Misenseor Goods, Abbot's Blessings
node.description: Olibanum incense cones smolder within a faience censer at the far corner of the wagon's heart. Their smoky tendrils whorl upward, deepening the already dark tones of a somber portrait just above. Unlike the other rooms, the floor here is neatly carpeted and furnished with velvet cushions.

node.name: Misenseor Goods, Zealous Destruction
node.description: The pinewood walls enclosing this side of the shop are equipped with implements of battle for the use of warrior monks. Large twin bowls, filled with red liquid, flank a stylized thirteen-pointed star burnt into the wall between the room's two egresses.

node.name: Jhanine Dering Cloaks, Sales Floor
node.description: Diffused light radiates from an ornate chandelier that hangs overhead, adding a layer of richness to the silk-draped walls of this luxurious room. Deep jewel-tones pattern the plush carpet that rests under a glossy satinwood table. Polished gold sconces provide a flattering light for the trio of full-length mirrors that occupy one corner. A pair of cloak racks flanks an ebonwood door.

node.name: Everything in Moderation, Main Room
node.description: Billowing slightly in the breeze, sheets of ivory cotton drape from the tent's ceiling in an attempt to give a light, airy feel to an otherwise small room. A mobile of hammered gears and gaethzen orbs suspends from brass wires of varying lengths and turns aimlessly in the current of air. Against the far wall, a mirror rests between an armoire and a wardrobe, while an ottoman placed near a shoe rack provides a place to rest or try on shoes.

node.name: Heikea, Food Display
node.description: Nestled in among the various furniture displays visible in the background, this corner of the shop offers refreshments prepared by the resident chef. Tables and chairs provide a place to relax and enjoy one's meal before resuming the shopping excursion.

node.name: Heikea, Beds
node.description: White painted walls give the shop a clean, bright feeling. Nestled in among the various other furniture displays visible in the background, this corner of the shop features beds available for purchase by the discerning homeowner.

node.name: Heikea, Chairs
node.description: White painted walls give the shop a clean, bright feeling. Nestled in among the various other furniture displays visible in the background, this corner of the shop features chairs available for purchase by the discerning homeowner.

node.name: Heikea, Tables
node.description: White painted walls give the shop a clean, bright feeling. Nestled in among the various other furniture displays visible in the background, this corner of the shop features tables available for purchase by the discerning homeowner.

node.name: Quiver In Fear
node.description: A thick blanket of cobwebs coats the walls and ceiling of the cramped shop, with a large mass draped from the rusted hooks on one wall. The lone shelf in the room is held to the wall by nothing more than rusty nails. Directly beneath the shelf, a crate, carton, and table display some of the merchant's wares.

node.name: Mob Mentality, Dilapidated Showroom
node.description: Rusting walls drip water in the corners, with spiders lurking where they can find a dry niche. Several broken barrels and crates compete for floor space in front of poorly constructed wooden furniture. The wares on display appear to belong in a farmer's toolshed, and given the scraggly appearance of the shifty-eyed sales clerks, they may once have been found there.

node.name: Mob Mentality, Effigies of Power
node.description: Patchwork silks conceal the walls of this portion of the shop, giving it a more refined feel -- until one notices the blackened metal through some of the more poorly-stitched seams. A crate draped in scarves displays some wares available for sale, while others are set out upon shelves.

node.name: This Little Piggy, Stayed Home
node.description: Bright green paint creates lush hills of soft-looking grasses upon the walls. A few trees dapple the rolling fields giving shade for the many hogs that are depicted frolicking, napping or nibbling from silver platters. A pack of proud peccary appear to have taken control over one of the hills and a slightly larger brown swine is perched at the peak while wearing a shiny silver crown. Set in the middle of the room are brightly polished wooden tables. A doorway carved with yet more pigs leads out of the shop.

node.name: This Little Piggy, Went To Market
node.description: A mural takes over all four walls, its pictures showing a bustling marketplace full of colorfully painted stalls draped with ribbons. Instead of the usual customers, the streets are full of pigs in all sizes and hues with their backs supporting shopping baskets and bags. On one side of the room, an actual grapefruit-pink stall is built to look like a dresser of drawers, each one a different metal.

node.name: Eye Spy
node.description: Little more than a closet, this tiny room is lit by what can only charitably called a chandelier -- a simple chain hanging from the ceiling supporting a dirty and chipped lantern. Two large and bizarre clusters of mannequin heads display spectacles for sale.

node.name: Ahreusse's Atelier, Adroit Artistry
node.description: Spotless mirrors line the metal walls here in order to trick the eye into visualizing a much larger and grander establishment. On every shelf and in every case, dazzling jewels vie for customers' attention. Though the merchandise is set out neatly, a fine coating of glittering grit has built up on every surface, covering the dingy steel pipes and tarnished iron floor in sparkling contrast.

node.name: Ahreusse's Atelier, Artist's Alcove
node.description: Resting against one wall is a modest workbench with a neat rack above it. A handful of finished products is placed atop the rack, apparently set aside for perhaps a final approval or polishing. Further seating is provided by a simple wooden stool opposite the workbench.

node.name: Lute The Room, Mainroom
node.description: Exotic woods and odd metals are heaped in and on containers throughout this cramped shop. A workbench, littered with tools, testifies that each instrument is handcrafted with care. A table stands near the door, displaying what's available for purchase.

node.name: Wedding Belles, Foyer
node.description: A sense of lightness and elegance pervades the room, helped by the richness of the ivory silk-covered walls. Silver sconces jut out from the walls, holding candles out from polished reflectors. A small side table against one wall holds some refreshments, and white chairs stand against the two flanking walls.

node.name: Wedding Bells, With This Ring
node.description: Subtle but bright lighting ensures that the clientele of this shop can properly appreciate the exquisite merchandise on offering. Pale birch paneling along the walls adds to the general feeling of light and warmth. Three display cases - trimmed in teak, ebony, and cherry - hold pride of place in the center of the salesfloor.

node.name: Wedding Belles, Artful Accouterments
node.description: Skylights admit light that pours over the cream-colored walls and pale pine planking on the floor. Mannequins stand in various poses in one corner of the room. Large floor to ceiling mirrors allow for the trying on of the merchandise before purchasing.

Lit chandeliers provide light now that night has descended, illuminating the cream-colored walls and pale pine floor planking. Mannequins stand in various poses in one corner. Large floor to ceiling mirrors allow for the trying on of the merchandise before purchasing.

node.name: Wedding Bells, Bridal Suite
node.description: Instead of wood, the walls are covered in an off-white silk with a subtle shifting pattern of moire watermarks. A tri-fold mirror stands in one corner while mannequins garbed in luscious fabrics display the shop's bridal wares. Delicate lamps scattered throughout the area provide copious illumination of the designs and details.

node.name: Wedding Bells, Dapper Designs
node.description: Deeply padded leather armchairs provide spots for lounging and resting before further shopping. Dark wood paneling of various woods run vertically along the walls to the white plasterwork of the ceiling. Large chandeliers dangle from the ceiling, illuminating the tables placed in the center of the room.

node.name: Chuffed To Be Stuffed, Large Workshop
node.description: Tone-on-tone white brocade has broken up at intervals with large clear cylinders that rise from oak floor to tent ceiling. Within each cylinder, a cloud of colored cotton resides, making a veritable rainbow within this large room. In between each cylinder are shelving units holding a variety of stuffed creatures or other objects. A large wine barrel has been placed in one corner of the room.

node.name: Scentsations, Sweet Senses
node.description: Pure white walls enclose the airy confines of the sales floor. Faint scents waft through the area, a bouquet of mingled aromas that blends into an overall impression of pleasure and delight. Across one wall stands a counter, its plain ash wood unrelieved by any ornamentation.

node.name: Scentsations, Once and Floral
node.description: Tiles on the floor form a stylized floral design in black and white with the same blossom theme repeated on the carved baseboards and crown moulding of the whitewashed walls. A plain birch counter stands against a wall, showing the shop's wares without any distractions from the furnishings.

node.name: Scentsations, Seasonal Scents
node.description: Thin black stripes alternate with wide white planks in the floor, set diagonally to the walls which are an austure white without any decoration. Hints of wintergreen, pumpkins, roses, and strawberries drift through the air, each new scent bringing memories of seasons long past. A long white counter stands in the center of the room, featuring the exquisite wares of the shop.

node.name: Scentsations, Functionally Fragrant
node.description: Heavy, almost overpowering scents dominate the room, each one warring with the other for preeminence. Besides a tall white counter, there is little in the room to distract from the overwhelming cacophony of scents that pervades the area. Spread across the display are the numerous bottles and vials of the shop's merchandise.

node.name: Sketchy by Design, Backroom
node.description: Polished red oak sheathes the walls and floor of this spacious room. Various wares sit on a table along the back wall, each filled to overflowing.

node.name: Piralpa Tridents, Coral Showroom
node.description: Sculpted in bas-relief, images of fish with childlike faces adorn the coral walls, their glassy gem eyes following any motion in the room due to tricks of light and shadow. The monotony of the rough walls is broken not only by these cheerful masques but by a series of thick colored bands, adding a rainbow of seafoam greens, ocean blues and pastel pinks to the otherwise pale coral room.

node.name: Piralpa Tridents, Shell Showroom
node.description: Shells from a variety of sea creatures turn the floor into a sparkling mosaic of iridescent color, a strong contrast to the dull beige shade of the walls. From the pale ceiling hang a few twisted ribbons of dried seaweed, suspending decorative bits of coral and stone to be reflected in the glossy and buffed surface of the floor.

node.name: Minaret, Roof
node.description: A one-room hut of thin white bone squats on top of the brick roof. Torchlight flickers through a series of lancet windows. A horseshoe archway frames an entrance, outlined along its length by writing engraved in flowing gold foil calligraphy.

node.name: Dark Symphony, Allegro
node.description: Soft somber music, barely noticeable in the background, sets the typically quiet atmosphere of the store. Shadows cast by the flickering candles play across the walls of the dimly-lit room. A table and a display swathed in velvet showcase the wares available for purchase.

node.name: Dark Symphony, Andante
node.description: The music changes in this part of the store but still maintains a quiet demeanor. Shadows cast by the flickering candles play across the walls of the dimly-lit room. A table and a display swathed in silk showcase the wares available for purchase.

node.name: Dark Symphony, Scherzo
node.description: The music changes slightly in this part of the shop, changing to a minor key and adding a more somber tone. Shadows cast by the flickering candles play across the walls of the dimly lit room. Tables topped with deep ebon leather display the wares available for purchase.

node.name: Dark Symphony, Rondo
node.description: The music increases in volume in this portion of the shop, perhaps to emphasize the lack of instruments for sale here, but still remains fairly subdued. Shadows cast by the flickering candles play across the walls of the dimly lit room. Cushioned stands display the wares available for purchase.

node.name: Eluned's Dreams in Flesh
node.description: The mother-of-pearl walls are a pristine white, reflecting light in iridescent swirls. Cabinets are stocked with dyes of every imaginable color and shade. Comfortable looking benches and stools are spaced about the room. Small tables are setup in the corners of the shop.

node.name: Gosling's Exotic Fish
node.description: Colorful fish dart amidst the greenery in a large tank along the far wall of the shop. Above the tank, water trickles from tier to tier down a roughly carved blue sandstone waterfall, finally tumbling into the tank. Light reflecting off the surface of the water sends flickering patterns dancing around the room.

node.name: Jousting Grounds, Lances and Roses Souvenir Shop
node.note: Lances and Roses Souvenir Shop|Jousting Grounds
node.description: Dolls, ribands and other souvenirs are laid out in neat groups atop the display tables in the shop. Sales clerks work quickly to maintain the order as items are snatched up by prize-hungry spectators attending the competitions.

node.name: The Future is Now, Workshop
node.description: The once spacious workshop is cramped by mechanical flights of fantasy. Many are little more than carefully annotated blueprints, scattered springs and stray gears, while others proudly proclaim their completion with scribbled price tags. Some merchandise lies in tangles and piles of clutter, while others sprawl across the workbench, a side table, the assorted shelving and even the walls.

node.name: Stupid Terrestrian Tricks, Registration
node.description: Monger Pyr Od'Lolg sits on a stool behind a narrow countertop lording over the registration list and watching the goings on with a careful eye.

node.name: Sputkin's Splendors, Cramped Loft
node.description: Not a single cobweb mars this small loft, allowing a feeling of comfort to permeate throughout. A single candle rises from a golden floor sconce, casting playfully dancing shadows on the walls.

node.name: Shaper's Furnishings, Golden Skies
node.description: The walls are painted a brilliant sunny yellow, and natural lighting from oversized windows only adds to the intensity. The small space contains cheerfully designed furniture of all shapes and sizes.

node.name: Silah's Sundries
node.description: Belying the simple exterior, cool green stone tiling spreads across the room blending into blue-grey crystalline walls. A small archway cuts through the back wall and into a dim room beyond. Lounging behind a counter cut from a large chunk of coral is a very content-looking Merelew.

node.name: Silah's Sundries, Back Room
node.description: Dim light enters through an archway cutting through the blue-green crystalline walls. The flickering rays dance across the green tiling, reflecting against the glittering polished facets of the low domed ceiling.
